required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Impact of 11-month Ticagrelor Monotherapy Following One-month DAPT After PCI
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multi-center, Single-group Target Value Post-marketing Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of the HT Supreme Drug-eluting Stent System in the Treatment of "Real-world" Patients With Coronary Heart Disease

collaborator.agency: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: PIONEER IV CHINA is sought to investigate the safety and efficacy of 11-month ticagrelor monotherapy following one-month dual antiplatelet therapy (DAPT) after HT Supreme drug-eluting stent system at 12 months follow-up.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a prospective, multi-center, single-arm objective performance criteria clinical trial in an all-comers patient population (including patients with high bleeding risk, HBR) undergoing PCI with unrestrictive use of the HT Supreme sirolimus-eluting stent and treated with 11-month ticagrelor monotherapy following one-month dual antiplatelet therapy (DAPT) in approximately 285 patients (including 80 coronary heart disease cases entering the OCT subgroup). All patients will be (at minimum) contacted via visit at 30 days (±7 days) and at 12 months (±30 days), and by phone contact at 6 months (±14 days), 24 months (±30 days) and 36 months (±45 days) post index procedure to assess clinical status and adverse events. The Primary Endpoint for this trial is Patient-oriented Composite Endpoint (PoCE) at 12 months post-procedure.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of Patient-oriented Composite Endpoint (PoCE) at 12 months post-procedure.
primary_outcome.description: PoCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: all-cause death; any stroke, Modified Rankin scale, (MRS ≥1); any myocardial infarction (peri-procedural MI according to SCAI, spontaneous according to 4th universal definition); any clinically and physiologically driven revascularization (ARC-2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Patient oriented composite endpoint (PoCE) at 2 and 3 years;
secondary_outcome.description: PoCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: all-cause death; any stroke, Modified Rankin scale, (MRS ≥1); any myocardial infarction (periprocedural MI according to SCAI, spontaneous according to 4th universal definition); any clinically and physiologically driven revascularization (ARC-2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Individual components of patient-oriented composite endpoint;
secondary_outcome.description: PoCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: all-cause death; any stroke, Modified Rankin scale, (MRS ≥1); any myocardial infarction (periprocedural MI according to SCAI, spontaneous according to 4th universal definition); any clinically and physiologically driven revascularization (ARC-2)
VoCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: Vessel-related cardiovascular Death; Target-vessel related MI; Clinically and physiologically-oriented Target vessel revascularization (ARC-2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Individual components of vessel-oriented composite endpoint;
secondary_outcome.description: VoCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: Vessel-related cardiovascular Death; Target-vessel related MI; Clinically and physiologically-oriented Target vessel revascularization (ARC-2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Device-oriented composite endpoint (DoCE) at all timepoints;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: VoCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: Cardiovascular Death；Target-vessel related MI；Clinically and physiologically-oriented Target lesion revascularization

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Individual components of device-oriented composite endpoint;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: VoCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: Cardiovascular Death；Target-vessel related MI；Clinically and physiologically-oriented Target lesion revascularization

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Pre-procedural myocardioal infarction according to 4th universal definition;
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Fourth Universal Definition of Myocardial Infarction (2018)
according to the statement from European Association of Percutaneous Cardiovascular Interventions (EAPCI) of the European Society of Cardiology (ESC))

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Stent thrombosis is consist of Definite stent thrombosis; Probable stent thrombosis; Definite or probable stent thrombosis

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Target-vessel failure composite endpoint
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: TVF is a composite clinical endpoint of: Cardiac death; Myocardial Infarction (MI) (unless clearly attributable to a non target vessel); Target vessel revascularization

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Individual components of Target-vessel failure composite endpoint
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: TVF is a composite clinical endpoint of: Cardiac death; Myocardial Infarction (MI) (unless clearly attributable to a non target vessel); Target vessel revascularization

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Bleeding according to BARC (2, 3 and 5) classification
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: Defining high bleeding risk in patients undergoing percutaneous coronary intervention: a consensus document from the Academic Research Consortium for High Bleeding Risk

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of Net adverse clinical and cerebral events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 30days, 6months, annually up to 3 years post procedure
secondary_outcome.description: NACCE is a composite clinical endpoint of: any cause, myocardial infarction (MI), cerebral vascular accident, and major bleeding (according to the modified REPLACE-2 and GUSTO criteria)
Cost of procedure will be collected in the eCRF(e.g. diagnostic tests, procedural materials, time of the procedure, re-angiography, repeat revascularization, etc. will be quantified).

other_outcome.measure: The percentage of the struts' neointimal coverage (%) measured by OCT
other_outcome.description: 80 patients enrolled with an extra one-month OCT follow-up as a subgroup analysis target. OCT examination was carried out at 1 month after the operation to evaluate percentage of the struts' neointimal coverage

other_outcome.measure: Neointimal hyperplasia area/volume measured by OCT
other_outcome.description: 80 patients enrolled with an extra one-month OCT follow-up as a subgroup analysis target. OCT measures Neointimal hyperplasia area(mm2)/volume(mm3)
80 patients enrolled with an extra one-month OCT follow-up as a subgroup analysis target. OCT measures Mean/Minimal Stent diameter(mm)/area(mm2)/volume(mm3)

other_outcome.measure: Mean/maximal thickness of the struts coverage(%)
other_outcome.description: 80 patients enrolled with an extra one-month OCT follow-up as a subgroup analysis target. OCT measures Mean/maximal thickness of the struts coverage
80 patients enrolled with an extra one-month OCT follow-up as a subgroup analysis target. OCT measures Mean/Minimal Lumen diameter(mm)/area(mm2)/volume(mm3)
80 patients enrolled with an extra one-month OCT follow-up as a subgroup analysis target. OCT examination was carried out at 1 month after the operation to evaluate incomplete strut apposition

arm_group.description: Device: HT Supreme ( R&D by Sinomed, Tianjin, China) Drug: 11-month ticagrelor monotherapy following one-month dual antiplatelet therapy (DAPT) after HT Supreme drug-eluting stent system interventions

intervention.description: HT Supreme ( R&D by Sinomed, Tianjin, China)

overall_official.affiliation: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University
The Second Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University
